propositions.text: The protagonist unexpectedly traverses to an ancient world.
The protagonist awakens in a dilapidated village, assuming the identity of a poor boy named Ah Dai.
Ah Dai possesses a pass to enter the city, but lacks the funds (ten taels of silver) to use it.
Ah Dai begins working in the village to earn money.
He takes up a job carrying water, earning a small income.
Ah Dai encounters challenges at the market while seeking a cheaper pass.
He fails to afford the pass and witnesses a young woman, Xiao Xue, being harassed by thugs.
Ah Dai intervenes despite his weakness, and both are rescued by a nobleman, Li Yunze.
Ah Dai is employed by Li Yunze and starts a new life in the mansion.
He performs miscellaneous tasks and befriends Xiao Xue, who helps him navigate mansion rules.
Tensions arise in the mansion due to external conflicts.
Ah Dai overhears disputes involving Li Yunze and learns of a rivalry with another prominent family.
A crisis emerges as Li Yunze is arrested, prompting Ah Dai and Xiao Xue to act.
They sneak into the rival family’s mansion and uncover evidence of a plot against Li Yunze.
The truth is revealed, leading to Li Yunze’s release and rewards for Ah Dai and Xiao Xue.
Ah Dai uses the reward to buy the pass and begins a new life in the city.

concepts.name: Traversal
concepts.context: The act of moving from the modern world to an ancient setting.

concepts.name: Pass
concepts.context: A document required to enter the city, symbolizing opportunity.

concepts.name: Social Hierarchy
concepts.context: The strict class distinctions in the ancient world.

concepts.name: Conflict
concepts.context: Rivalries and disputes between families or individuals.

concepts.name: Courage
concepts.context: Ah Dai’s bravery in confronting thugs and aiding others.

hierarchy.structure: The document follows a linear narrative structure, progressing from the protagonist’s traversal to an ancient world, through personal and social challenges, to a resolution involving uncovering a conspiracy and achieving a new status.
